message.content:
cs.DC, cs.DS, cs.SY, cs.PL, cs.SE 

Reasoning: 
- cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing) is the most likely category as the paper focuses on designing and implementing a data migration mechanism for stateful distributed dataflow engines. 
- cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) is also likely as the paper deals with managing state in distributed dataflow systems. 
- cs.SY (Systems and Control) is another possible category as the paper discusses latency objectives and reducing service latencies during reconfiguration. 
- cs.PL (Programming Languages) is a possible category as the paper implements Megaphone as a library on an unmodified timely dataflow implementation and provides an operator interface compatible with its existing APIs. 
- cs.SE (Software Engineering) is also a possible category as the paper discusses the evaluation of Megaphone on established benchmarks and compares it to naive approaches.
